TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EntityConnectionStringBuilder extends System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder
Public NotInheritable Class EntityConnectionStringBuilder Inherits DbConnectionStringBuilder

Docs.summary: Provides a simple way to create and manage the contents of connection strings used by the EntityClient.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 通过连接字符串生成器，开发人员可以使用该类的属性和方法，以编程方式创建语法正确的连接字符串以及分析和重新生成现有的连接字符串。 连接字符串生成器提供了与已知关键字/值对相对应的强类型属性。 必须在应用程序中创建连接字符串的开发人员可以使用 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder> 类生成和修改连接字符串。
<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder> 对关键字/值对的有效性进行检查，其中每个关键字/值对都被公开为一个 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder> 属性值。
> [!NOTE] > 基础数据源的连接字符串由 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder.ProviderConnectionString%2A> 属性提供。 对于提供的提供程序连接字符串，将不对关键字/值对的有效性进行检查。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配合使用 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder> 和 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>。
[!code-csharp[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/CS/Program.cs#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)] [!code-vb[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/VB/Program.vb#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配合使用 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder> 和 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>。 该代码设置的属性`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`若要创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>提供基础提供程序连接字符串的一部分的连接字符串。 请注意，不能使用集提供程序名称`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`因为它不是有效`SqlConnection`连接字符串语法。 该代码会创建<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过设置连接字符串`EntityConnectionStringBuilder`属性。
[!code-csharp[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/CS/Program.cs#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)] [!code-vb[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/VB/Program.vb#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string connectionString) cil managed

Docs.param: A provider-specific connection string to the underlying data source.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the supplied connection string.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 所提供`connectionString`有效关键字/值对的未选中。 有关有效的关键字/值语法，请参见 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。
必须指定固定的提供程序名称`connectionString`参数。 支持的提供程序包括：
- `System.Data.Odbc`
- `System.Data.OleDb`
- `System.Data.OracleClient`
- `System.Data.SqlClient`
- `Microsoft.SqlServerCe.Client`
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配合使用 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder> 和 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>。 该代码设置的属性`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`若要创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>提供基础提供程序连接字符串的一部分的连接字符串。 请注意，不能使用集提供程序名称`SqlConnectionStringBuilder`因为它不是有效`SqlConnection`连接字符串语法。 该代码会创建<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection>通过设置连接字符串`EntityConnectionStringBuilder`属性。 它不使用`connectionString`重载。
[!code-csharp[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/CS/Program.cs#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)] [!code-vb[eSQLBasicExamples#BuildingConnectionStringWithEntityCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/eSQLBasicExamples/VB/Program.vb#buildingconnectionstringwithentitycommand)]

Default Public Overrides Property Item(keyword As String) As Object

member this.Item(string) : obj with get, set

Docs.param: The key of the item to get or set.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 由于 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder> 包含固定大小的字典，因此如果尝试添加的键不在字典中，则会引发 <xref:System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException>。
有关有效的关键字/值语法，请参见 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

Docs.exception: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
Tried to add a key that does not exist in the available keys.
Invalid value in the connection string (specifically, a Boolean or numeric value was expected but not supplied).

member this.Provider : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the underlying [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] data provider in the connection string.
Docs.value: 基础的固定名称 [！INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 数据提供程序。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 固定的提供程序名称可用于检索基础提供程序的 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory> 对象。
有关有效的关键字/值语法，请参见 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ProviderConnectionString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ProviderConnectionString : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the inner, provider-specific connection string.
Docs.value: 提供程序特定的内部连接字符串。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 设置提供程序特定的连接字符串之前，将不对其关键字/值对的有效性进行检查。 开发人员可以使用强类型连接字符串生成器类或 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> 类创建连接字符串。 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> 不会对关键字/值对的有效性进行检查。 因此，使用此类可能会创建出无效的连接字符串。
有关有效的关键字/值语法，请参见 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Remove(string keyword) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Remove (keyword As String) As Boolean

Docs.param: The key of the keyword/value pair to be removed from the connection string in this .
Docs.summary: Removes the entry with the specified key from the instance.
Docs.returns: Returns if the key existed in the connection string and was removed; if the key did not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为`Remove`方法返回一个值，指示它是否成功，它不需要查找键中移除关键字/值对从之前<xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder>实例。

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool TryGetValue (string keyword, out object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool TryGetValue(string keyword, [out] object& value) cil managed
Public Overrides Function TryGetValue (keyword As String, ByRef value As Object) As Boolean
public: override bool TryGetValue(System::String ^ keyword, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % value);

Docs.param: The key of the item to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this .
Docs.returns: Returns if was found in the connection string; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder.TryGetValue%2A> 方法允许开发人员安全地从 <xref:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder> 中检索值，而无需验证提供的键名是否为有效的键名。 `TryGetValue` 传递不存在的键时，不会引发异常。 调用`TryGetValue`不存在的键将值为 null (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 中`value`参数。

Docs.exception: contains a null value ( in Visual Basic).
